metadata.dc:title: Medicine and literature in the training of a House physician an internal medicine
metadata.dc:description: Medical humanities are inseparable from the clinical activity. The aim of this paper is to demonstrate that evidence-based medicine and humanitary medicine based on narratives and values must be necessarily en effectively joined. It is detailed the utility of literature in the training of a house physician in internal medicine and it is exposed as methodology a complementary learning program about medicine and literature. Literary works are able to do from a reader physician, a “better physician”
metadata.dc:creator: Barbado Hernández, F. J
metadata.dc:description: Las humanidades médicas son inseparables de la actividad clínica. El objetivo de este trabajo es demostrar que la medicina basada en pruebas y la medicina humanitaria basada en narrativas y valores deben ir necesaria y eficazmente juntas. Se detalla para qué sirve la literatura en la formación del médico residente de medicina interna y se expone como metódica un programa de docencia complementaria sobre medicina y literatura. Las obras literarias pueden hacer al lector médico, un “mejor médico”
